section.title: Storing DITA files in library (source control) systems
section.p: DITA source files are stored on disk as ASCII text files, just as are source code files for software projects. Because of this source control or library systems used to store and manage software source code can also be used for DITA source files. A source control system stores and tracks changes to source files. Multiple versions of source files are kept, and most systems have built-in capabilities to display differences between different versions of the same file.
